lead_paragraph: Carlos Boozer had 31 points and 11 rebounds and Coach Jerry Sloan received his 1,000th career victory when the host Utah Jazz defeated the Dallas Mavericks, 101-79, last night.
snippet: Carlos Boozer had 31 points and 11 rebounds and Coach Jerry Sloan received his 1,000th career victory when the host Utah Jazz defeated the Dallas Mavericks, 101-79, last night.
